item.description:
Readers:

Robert Pinsky, Former Poet Laureate of the United States
Derek Walcott, Nobel Prize?winning poet
Leslie Epstein, director of the Creative Writing Program at Boston University
David Ferry, fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences
Allegra Goodman, bestselling author and finalist for the National Book Award
Ha Jin, National Book Award winner, two-time winner of the PEN/Faulkner, and former student of the Creative Writing Program
Rosanna Warren, acclaimed poet, scholar, and translator
Tom Yuill, Creative Writing Program alum

The event is free and open to the public.
item.name: BU Creative Writing Annual Faculty Reading
